description: Denominators of continued fraction convergents to sqrt(312).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,0,0,106,0,0,0,-1).
mathematica: Denominator/@Convergents[Sqrt[312], 30] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Jun 04 2011 *)CoefficientList[Series[(1 + x - x^2) (x^4 + 3 x^2 + 1)/(x^8 - 106 x^4 + 1), {x, 0, 30}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Dec 20 2013 *)
prog: (MAGMA) I:=[1,1,2,3,104,107,211,318]; [n le 8 select I[n] else 106*Self(n-4)-Self(n-8): n in [1..40]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Dec 20 2013
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
